nodes.excerpt: Use data from your APIs, databases, or integrations to empower every team to grow your business’s bottom-line. Leverage OKRs and KPIs to cultivate a culture of accountability, transparency, and autonomy by focusing on your outcomes, not outputs.

nodes.excerpt: Startup benchmark data is fragmented and disorganized, scattered across hundreds of Medium blogs. We are curating the world’s largest library of startup benchmark data, creating market transparency for founders and institutions.

nodes.excerpt: Lullaby helps treat Tinnitus, a condition that makes you hear a very annoying sound for the rest of your life. Most of the ENTs I checked with seemed poorly prepared to help their patients with the stress, so the app teaches you a healthy way to do that.
nodes.title: Lullaby - Helps you treat Tinnitus, a chronic health condition
nodes.author: Roberto González

localize.description: 摇篮曲有助于治疗耳鸣，这是一种让你在余生中听到非常恼人的声音的情况。我检查过的大多数耳鼻喉科医生似乎都没有准备好帮助他们的病人解决压力，所以这个应用程序教你一个健康的方法。
localize.tagline: 帮助您治疗慢性病--耳鸣。

localize.description: 搖籃曲有助於治療耳鳴，這是一種讓你在餘生中聽到非常惱人的聲音的情況。我檢查過的大多數耳鼻喉科醫生似乎都沒有準備好幫助他們的病人解決壓力，所以這個應用程序教你一個健康的方法。
localize.tagline: 幫助您治療慢性病--耳鳴。

nodes.excerpt: Kanda is building Affirm for general contractors. We let builders offer their customers a pay monthly option when they want a remodel but don't want to pay the full price upfront. Backed by YC (W21).
nodes.title: Kanda - Affirm for general contractors
nodes.author: Michael Seibel

localize.description: 康达正在为总承包商打造Affirm。我们让建筑商为他们的客户提供一个按月支付的选项，当他们想要改造但又不想预付全款时。得到了YC（W21）的支持。
localize.tagline: 申明为总承包商

localize.tagline: 申明爲總承包商

nodes.excerpt: NexStem Headset and Wisdom SDK allows you to capture high quality EEG data and process them in real-time to give predictions about what you are thinking, and then deploy that to a device or application to control them using nothing but your thoughts.
nodes.title: NexStem Headset & Wisdom SDK - Develop and deploy mind-controlled devices and applications
nodes.author: Siddhant Dangi

localize.description: NexStem Headset and Wisdom SDK允许您采集高质量的脑电图数据，并实时处理这些数据，以预测您的想法，然后将其部署到设备或应用程序中，只用您的想法来控制它们。
localize.tagline: 开发和部署精神控制设备和应用程序

localize.description: NexStem Headset and Wisdom SDK允許您採集高質量的腦電圖數據，並實時處理這些數據，以預測您的想法，然後將其部署到設備或應用程序中，只用您的想法來控制它們。
localize.tagline: 開發和部署精神控制設備和應用程序

nodes.excerpt: Want to expand your social network and meet interesting people online? Join ChitterChat and be matched one time per week with someone to speak to 1 on 1. Having Twitter will speed up the waiting time dramatically as we can verify you're a real person.
nodes.title: ChitterChat - Speak to 1 new person every week
nodes.author: Isaac Joy

localize.description: 想扩大您的社交网络，并在网上认识有趣的人吗？加入ChitterChat，每周匹配一次1对1交谈的对象。拥有Twitter将大大加快等待时间，因为我们可以验证你是一个真实的人。
localize.tagline: 每周与一个新的人交谈

localize.description: 想擴大您的社交網絡，並在網上認識有趣的人嗎？加入ChitterChat，每週匹配一次1對1交談的對象。擁有Twitter將大大加快等待時間，因爲我們可以驗證你是一個真實的人。
localize.tagline: 每週與一個新的人交談

nodes.excerpt: Collect Colossal Content. Hypto.io takes NFT collection beyond the digital art space and allows its users to collect HUGE moments in internet history from an exclusive network of creators and influencers.

nodes.excerpt: Plasma.Finance is DeFi dashboard which aggregates the most popular DeFi protocols from different blockchains and allows users to manage their DeFi portfolio in one simple interface. You can trade and buy any ERC20 tokens with your Coinbase or Metamask wallet.
nodes.title: Plasma Finance - The easiest way to invest in DeFi & manage crypto portfolio
nodes.author: Ilia Maksimenka

localize.description: Plasma.Finance是DeFi仪表板，它聚合了来自不同区块链的最流行的DeFi协议，允许用户在一个简单的界面上管理他们的DeFi投资组合。您可以使用Coinbase或Metamask钱包交易和购买任何ERC20代币。
localize.tagline: 最简单的投资DeFi和管理加密投资组合的方法。

localize.description: Plasma.Finance是DeFi儀表板，它聚合了來自不同區塊鏈的最流行的DeFi協議，允許用戶在一個簡單的界面上管理他們的DeFi投資組合。您可以使用Coinbase或Metamask錢包交易和購買任何ERC20代幣。
localize.tagline: 最簡單的投資DeFi和管理加密投資組合的方法。

nodes.excerpt: Whether you're a maker, content creator, freelancer, indie hacker, influencer, or thought leader, The Creator System will help you stay organised and on track. You no longer need to rely solely on your motivation or inspiration to get things done.
nodes.title: The Creator System - Be organised, stay productive and produce outcomes in Notion
nodes.author: Isabel Nyo

localize.description: 无论你是制造者、内容创作者、自由职业者、独立黑客、影响者还是思想领袖，《创客系统》都将帮助你保持组织性和正轨性。你不再需要仅仅依靠你的动机或灵感来完成事情。
localize.tagline: 有条不紊，保持生产力，并在Notion中产生成果。

nodes.excerpt: Web Analytics made simple and therefore privacy friendly. No Cookies. No logging. No IP address fingerprinting. We don't collect personal data, which allows serving many users with little hosting costs. The source code is published under the AGPL‑v3 licence.
nodes.title: Counter - Simple and free web analytics
nodes.author: Bogdan Slomchinskiy

localize.description: 网络分析变得简单，因此对隐私友好。没有Cookies。没有记录。没有IP地址指纹。我们不收集个人数据，这允许以较少的托管成本为许多用户服务。源代码是在AGPL-v3许可下发布的。
localize.tagline: 简单而免费的网络分析

localize.description: 網絡分析變得簡單，因此對隱私友好。沒有Cookies。沒有記錄。沒有IP地址指紋。我們不收集個人數據，這允許以較少的託管成本爲許多用戶服務。源代碼是在AGPL-v3許可下發布的。
localize.tagline: 簡單而免費的網絡分析

nodes.excerpt: appfleet is an edge compute platform that allows people to deploy their web applications globally. Instead of running your code in a single centralized location you can now run it everywhere, at the same time. Get better performance, latency and uptime!
nodes.title: appfleet - Edge compute for containerized services & deploy global apps
nodes.author: Dmitriy A.

localize.description: appfleet是一个边缘计算平台，允许人们在全球范围内部署他们的网络应用。您现在可以在任何地方同时运行您的代码，而不是在单一的集中位置运行。获得更好的性能、延迟和正常运行时间!
localize.tagline: 用于容器化服务和部署全局应用的边缘计算。

localize.description: appfleet是一個邊緣計算平臺，允許人們在全球範圍內部署他們的網絡應用。您現在可以在任何地方同時運行您的代碼，而不是在單一的集中位置運行。獲得更好的性能、延遲和正常運行時間!
localize.tagline: 用於容器化服務和部署全局應用的邊緣計算。

nodes.excerpt: Tally is a new type of form builder. Just start typing and build forms for all purposes in seconds. Without knowing how to code, and for free!
nodes.title: Tally - The simplest way to create forms for free
nodes.author: Filip Minev

localize.description: Tally是一种新型的表单构建器。只需开始输入并在几秒钟内建立各种用途的表单。不需要知道如何编写代码，而且是免费的。
localize.tagline: 免费创建表格的最简单方法

localize.description: Tally是一種新型的表單構建器。只需開始輸入並在幾秒鐘內建立各種用途的表單。不需要知道如何編寫代碼，而且是免費的。
localize.tagline: 免費創建表格的最簡單方法
